org.fxyz3d.geometry

Class Ray

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.fxyz3d.geometry.Ray

  • public class Ray
extends java.lang.Object

    Simple Ray class.
    Allowing for a variety of performance and productivity enhancements.
    Following up on Jose Pereda's RayTest intersection example in the Tests package

      • reProject

        public javafx.geometry.Point3D reProject(javafx.geometry.Point3D orig,
                                         double dist)
        Projects the Ray from new origin along direction by distance using the original direction.
        Useful for objects moving in a constant direction.
        Parameters:
        orig - the new origin point
        dist - distance to project ray
        Returns:
        sets origin and returns projected position
